languages.text: "Выродкам вроде тебя никогда не узреть истинный свет праведной веры, ибо мы — дети Бога-Императора. Вы же — гниющая рана на теле Вселенной, чья погибель — лишь вопрос времени".

traits.locale_text: "Выродкам вроде тебя никогда не узреть истинный свет праведной веры, ибо мы — дети Бога-Императора. Вы же — гниющая рана на теле Вселенной, чья погибель — лишь вопрос времени".
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "Abominations like you will never see the true light of righteous faith. We are the children of the God-Emperor, and you are a festering wound on the body of the galaxy whose fall is only a matter of time."
languages.original_text: "Выродкам вроде тебя никогда не узреть истинный свет праведной веры, ибо мы — дети Бога-Императора. Вы же — гниющая рана на теле Вселенной, чья погибель — лишь вопрос времени".

traits.locale_text: "Abominations like you will never see the true light of righteous faith. We are the children of the God-Emperor, and you are a festering wound on the body of the galaxy whose fall is only a matter of time."

"Abominations like you will never see the true light of righteous faith. We are the children of the God-Emperor, and you are a festering wound on the body of the galaxy whose fall is only a matter of time."

"Abominations like you will never see the true light of righteous faith. We are the children of the God-Emperor, and you are a festering wound on the body of the galaxy whose fall is only a matter of time."

languages.text: "Abscheulichkeiten wie Ihr werden das wahre Licht rechtschaffenen Glaubens niemals erblicken. Wir sind die Kinder des Gottimperators, und Ihr seid eine schwärende Wunde am Körper der Galaxie, deren Untergang nur eine Frage der Zeit ist."
languages.original_text: "Abominations like you will never see the true light of righteous faith. We are the children of the God-Emperor, and you are a festering wound on the body of the galaxy whose fall is only a matter of time."

traits.locale_text: "Abscheulichkeiten wie Ihr werden das wahre Licht rechtschaffenen Glaubens niemals erblicken. Wir sind die Kinder des Gottimperators, und Ihr seid eine schwärende Wunde am Körper der Galaxie, deren Untergang nur eine Frage der Zeit ist."

languages.text: « Les abominations telles que vous ne parviendront jamais à percevoir la véritable lumière de la foi. Nous sommes les enfants de l'Empereur-Dieu, et vous n'êtes qu'une plaie suppurante qui infecte le corps d'une galaxie sur le point de s'effondrer. »
languages.original_text: "Abominations like you will never see the true light of righteous faith. We are the children of the God-Emperor, and you are a festering wound on the body of the galaxy whose fall is only a matter of time."

traits.locale_text: « Les abominations telles que vous ne parviendront jamais à percevoir la véritable lumière de la foi. Nous sommes les enfants de l'Empereur-Dieu, et vous n'êtes qu'une plaie suppurante qui infecte le corps d'une galaxie sur le point de s'effondrer. »

languages.text: “像你这样的怪物，永远都看不到正义信仰的纯洁明光。我们是神皇的子嗣，而你不过是银河之中一道溃烂的脓疮，你们的灭亡仅仅是个时间问题。”
languages.original_text: "Abominations like you will never see the true light of righteous faith. We are the children of the God-Emperor, and you are a festering wound on the body of the galaxy whose fall is only a matter of time."

traits.locale_text: “像你这样的怪物，永远都看不到正义信仰的纯洁明光。我们是神皇的子嗣，而你不过是银河之中一道溃烂的脓疮，你们的灭亡仅仅是个时间问题。”

languages.text: «Las abominaciones como tú jamás verán la luz verdadera de la fe justa. Nosotros somos los hijos del Dios Emperador, y vosotros sois una herida supurante en el cuerpo de la galaxia cuya cura es solo cuestión de tiempo».
languages.original_text: "Abominations like you will never see the true light of righteous faith. We are the children of the God-Emperor, and you are a festering wound on the body of the galaxy whose fall is only a matter of time."

traits.locale_text: «Las abominaciones como tú jamás verán la luz verdadera de la fe justa. Nosotros somos los hijos del Dios Emperador, y vosotros sois una herida supurante en el cuerpo de la galaxia cuya cura es solo cuestión de tiempo».

languages.text: 「あなたのような忌まわしき存在が、正しき信仰の光を見ることなど決してない。私たちは神帝陛下の子供であり、あなたは銀河という肉体に巣食う膿んだ傷口だ。あなたが滅びるのは、時間の問題にすぎない」
languages.original_text: "Abominations like you will never see the true light of righteous faith. We are the children of the God-Emperor, and you are a festering wound on the body of the galaxy whose fall is only a matter of time."

traits.locale_text: 「あなたのような忌まわしき存在が、正しき信仰の光を見ることなど決してない。私たちは神帝陛下の子供であり、あなたは銀河という肉体に巣食う膿んだ傷口だ。あなたが滅びるのは、時間の問題にすぎない」

languages.text: "Sizin gibi iğrenç varlıklar, dürüst inancın gerçek ışığını asla göremeyecek. Biz Tanrı İmparator'un çocuklarıyız. Sizse düşüşü sadece zaman meselesi olan galaksinin bedeninde kangren olmuş bir yarasınız."
languages.original_text: "Abominations like you will never see the true light of righteous faith. We are the children of the God-Emperor, and you are a festering wound on the body of the galaxy whose fall is only a matter of time."

traits.locale_text: "Sizin gibi iğrenç varlıklar, dürüst inancın gerçek ışığını asla göremeyecek. Biz Tanrı İmparator'un çocuklarıyız. Siz, düşüşü sadece zaman meselesi olan galaksinin bedeninde, kangren olmuş bir yarasınız."
